name: Absol
author: GIDORA
flavor_text: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.

attacks.name: Swirling Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Claw Rend
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 70 more damage.
